title: Blood Moon Jhin

embed.description: Here is a fan art skin I did for the LoL character Jhin for fun. (Khada Jhin is of course property of Riot Games and from League of Legends)

body: Not my art, (link will provide the original artist) but I thought this would be a good skin. It fiits well thematically the animations could be quite sick and it even fits in with the mini-lore of the Blood Moon skin line. Jhin must have made quite a name for himself in Ionia so it would fit in quite well with the whole "Blood moon skins are champions portrayed as in Ionian folklore".

replies.body: That is sexy and fits jhin so well. now his joke just needs him pulling out a wardrobe with all his masks in it.
riot , now you know what you need to do ;) {{summoner:4}}
haha thanks for sharing my work :D
If when he ults just a blood moon spot light appears around him, that would just be perfect.
